name: Attack on the Growing Titans
description:
* This game was created for 2022 Kenney Game Jam and placed 69th ( ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ) place

( Press blue fullscreen for correct UI SCALING )

NEW STUFF: 

- Added vehicles (buggy, tank, mother tank)

- Shooting can now go over objects.

- Bug fixes

How to play:

WASD - move

Shift + WASD - Dash

LMB - Shoot (hold for auto)

Scroll - Zoom in/out

'E' to open shop (When near)

'R' to enter vehicle ( LMB for main gun, RMB for secondary gun (if has) )
